author: Reuters Editorial
title: Cryptoglobal To Acquire Blockchain Dynamics
text:
March 1 (Reuters) - Cryptoglobal Corp:
* CRYPTOGLOBAL TO ACQUIRE BLOCKCHAIN DYNAMICS * CRYPTOGLOBAL CORP - TRANSACTION VALUE OF APPROXIMATELY $28 MILLION HAS BEEN COMPLETED AT $1.40 PER SHARE
* CRYPTOGLOBAL CORP - DEAL FOR APPROXIMATELY $28 MILLION
* CRYPTOGLOBAL - ALL OUTSTANDING SHARES OF BLOCKCHAIN DYNAMICS WILL BE EXCHANGED FOR 20.2 MILLION SHARES OF CO
* CRYPTOGLOBAL - BLOCKCHAIN DYNAMICS BRINGS EXCLUSIVE CUSTODIAL SERVICE ARRANGEMENTS, $1.75 MILLION IN CASH, $2 MILLION IN CRYPTOCURRENCY HOLDINGS TO CO Source text for Eikon: (Reuters.Brief@thomsonreuters.com)
